thread.title: BRIEF-Kyowa Kirin, Ultragenyx Announce Crysvita Receives Conditional Marketing Authorization In Europe For The Treatment Of X–Linked Hypophosphatemia In Children

title: BRIEF-Kyowa Kirin, Ultragenyx Announce Crysvita Receives Conditional Marketing Authorization In Europe For The Treatment Of X–Linked Hypophosphatemia In Children
text: Market News  10 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Kyowa Kirin, Ultragenyx Announce Crysvita Receives Conditional Marketing Authorization In Europe For The Treatment Of X–Linked Hypophosphatemia In Children Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 23 (Reuters) - Ultragenyx Pharmaceutical Inc: * KYOWA KIRIN AND ULTRAGENYX ANNOUNCE CRYSVITA® (BUROSUMAB) RECEIVES CONDITIONAL MARKETING AUTHORIZATION IN EUROPE FOR THE TREATMENT OF X–LINKED HYPOPHOSPHATEMIA IN CHILDREN * ULTRAGENYX PHARMACEUTICAL - ‍FIRST COMMERCIAL LAUNCH OF CRYSVITA IS EXPECTED TO TAKE PLACE IN GERMANY IN Q2 OF 2018​ Source text for Eikon:
